name: Helsinki City Double
description: Double the experience in the new event Helsinki City Double! On May 16th, 2020 you can challenge yourself and run both the half marathon and the marathon on the same day.

name: Terwa Run & Marathon
description: The start line is just outside the athletic stadium of Oulu. The course is scenic, flat and fast. Marathon runners run the half marathon course twice. The finish line is located at the stadium.
